{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
Sacrifice Commander's Sphere: Draw a card.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

name: Confounding Conundrum
oracle_text:
When Confounding Conundrum enters the battlefield, draw a card.
Whenever a land enters the battlefield under an opponent's control, if that player had another land enter the battlefield under their control this turn, they return a land they control to its owner's hand.

name: Conspicuous Snoop
oracle_text:
Play with the top card of your library revealed.
You may cast Goblin spells from the top of your library.
As long as the top card of your library is a Goblin card, Conspicuous Snoop has all activated abilities of that card.

name: Containment Priest
oracle_text:
Flash
If a nontoken creature would enter the battlefield and it wasn't cast, exile it instead.

name: Coralhelm Chronicler
oracle_text:
Whenever you cast a kicked spell, draw a card, then discard a card.
When Coralhelm Chronicler enters the battlefield, look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a card with a kicker ability from among them and put it into your hand. Put the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

name: Cosima, God of the Voyage // The Omenkeel
type_line: Legendary Creature — God // Legendary Artifact — Vehicle

card_faces.name: Cosima, God of the Voyage
card_faces.oracle_text: At the beginning of your upkeep, you may exile Cosima. If you do, it gains "Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, if Cosima is exiled, you may put a voyage counter on it. If you don't, return Cosima to the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it and draw X cards, where X is the number of voyage counters on it."

card_faces.name: The Omenkeel
card_faces.oracle_text:
Whenever a Vehicle you control deals combat damage to a player, that player exiles that many cards from the top of their library. You may play lands from among those cards for as long as they remain exiled.

name: Cosmos Elixir
oracle_text: At the beginning of your end step, draw a card if your life total is greater than your starting life total. Otherwise, you gain 2 life.

name: Council's Judgment
oracle_text: Will of the council — Starting with you, each player votes for a nonland permanent you don't control. Exile each permanent with the most votes or tied for most votes.

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.

name: Court of Ambition
oracle_text:
When Court of Ambition enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, each opponent loses 3 life unless they discard a card. If you're the monarch, instead each opponent loses 6 life unless they discard two cards.

name: Court of Bounty
oracle_text:
When Court of Bounty enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, you may put a land card from your hand onto the battlefield. If you're the monarch, instead you may put a creature or land card from your hand onto the battlefield.

name: Court of Cunning
oracle_text:
When Court of Cunning enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, any number of target players each mill two cards. If you're the monarch, each of those players mills ten cards instead. (To mill a card, a player puts the top card of their library into their graveyard.)

name: Court of Grace
oracle_text:
When Court of Grace enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. If you're the monarch, create a 4/4 white Angel creature token with flying instead.

name: Court of Ire
oracle_text:
When Court of Ire enters the battlefield, you become the monarch.
At the beginning of your upkeep, Court of Ire deals 2 damage to any target. If you're the monarch, it deals 7 damage instead.

name: Coveted Prize
oracle_text:
This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature in your party. (Your party consists of up to one each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)
Search your library for a card, put it into your hand, then shuffle. If you have a full party, you may cast a spell with mana value 4 or less from your hand without paying its mana cost.
